primary.context: Caller wanted to pay fees but failed name verification multiple times
primary.detail: The AI failed to verify the caller's name against the record found via contract ID, leading the caller to request a representative.

steps: Caller stated intent to pay maintenance fees.
AI attempted name lookup but failed to find a match.
AI requested spelling of the name and repeated it back.
AI still failed to match and requested the contract ID.
Caller provided contract ID and AI successfully pulled the record.
AI insisted on name verification again despite having the contract record.
Caller became frustrated and requested a representative.
AI transferred the caller to the concierge queue.

failure.detail: Agent persisted in name verification loops even after successfully pulling the record via contract ID.

clarifications.note: Initial name lookup failed to match record
Second attempt at name verification failed

loops.subject: name verification
loops.note: Repeatedly asking for name despite contract ID match

actions.detail: Lookup by name Caroline Vasquez failed
Name verification failed after contract ID match
Transferred to concierge after customer request

insights.summary: The caller wanted to pay maintenance fees but was unable to pass name verification. Despite providing a valid contract ID that pulled up the record, the AI continued to loop on name verification until the caller requested a human.
insights.verbatim: Talk to representative. Talk Take me to take me to representative. I don't wanna talk to you.
insights.coaching: The agent should be more flexible with name matching once a contract ID is provided, especially given that family members often call. It should have proceeded to send the payment link after the contract ID was verified.
